mod.name: Ballista
mod.author: slawkens
mod.action:
function onUse(cid, item, fromPosition, itemEx, toPosition) local pos = getThingPos(item.uid) if(item.itemid == 5692) then pos.y = pos.y - 6 elseif(item.itemid == 5695) then pos.y = pos.y + 6 elseif(item.itemid == 5698) then pos.x = pos.x - 8 pos.y = pos.y + 1 elseif(item.itemid == 5701) then pos.x = pos.x + 8 pos.y = pos.y - 1 end
doSendDistanceShoot(fromPosition, pos, CONST_ANI_BOLT) return true end
